DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate incidence pattern bladder symptom sexual function change occur simple hysterectomy analyze influence bladder symptom sexual function change quality life patient .
DOC.brief_title: Study Bladder Sexual Function Change After Simple Hysterectomy
DOC.criteria: Patients plan undergo simple hysterectomy due benign uterine disease 1 . Uterine leiomyoma 2 . Uterine adenomyosis 3 . Endometrial hyperplasia 4 . Cervical intraepithelial neoplasia ( include carcinoma situ , FIGO stage IA1 cancer ) 5 . Dysfunctional uterine bleed 6 . Other benign uterine disease require hysterectomy Patients take medication overactive bladder Patients underwent incontinence surgery due urinary incontinence Acute chronic infectious disease urinary tract Neurologic disease cause urinary abnormality Previous pelvic radiation therapy Patients undergoing incontinence surgery hysterectomy Pregnant woman
